item.title: An Israeli airstrike hits a school sheltering people in Gaza, killing at least 30 including children - The Associated Press
item.description:
1. An Israeli airstrike hits a school sheltering people in Gaza, killing at least 30 including children  The Associated Press
  2. At least 30 dead in Gaza school airstrike, Israel says targeted militants  Reuters
  3. Israeli attacks kill more than 50 Palestinians across Gaza  Al Jazeera English
  4. IDF strikes Hamas command room, terror operatives embedded within Gaza school used as shelter for displaced Palestinians  The Times of Israel
  5. Health officials: Over 50 killed in Israeli airstrikes in central and southern Gaza  Haaretz

item.title: After ‘big show’ in U.S., Netanyahu returns to turmoil at home
item.description: The prime minster’s inner circle was largely satisfied with the trip — but it might not solve Netanyahu’s cratering popularity among the Israeli electorate.

item.title: Netanyahu vows revenge after rocket strike kills 11 young people in Golan Heights
item.description:
Israeli PM blames Hezbollah for deadly strike on football pitch amid daylong barrage from Lebanon

Israel’s prime minister, Benjamin Netanyahu, vowed the Lebanese militant group Hezbollah would “pay a hefty price” after a strike on a football pitch in a remote town in the occupied Golan Heights killed11 young people and a daylong barrage of rocket fire from Lebanon targeted Israeli territory.

Israel’s Magen David Adom emergency services said “large numbers” of ambulances were dispatched to the scene to treat the casualties, all aged between 10 and 20 years old. Video and imagery showed young casualties strewn across the grass, some wearing sports shirts.

Continue reading...

item.title: Note to JD Vance: Appalachia is in no need of political charlatans and their elegies
